org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.layer.unit

Interface UnitControllerRegistry<D extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage,DB extends com.google.protobuf.GeneratedMessage.Builder<DB>>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the data type of the units used for the state synchronization.
    DB - the builder used to build the unit data instances.
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.openbase.jul.iface.provider.NameProvider, org.openbase.jul.pattern.Observable<Map<String,UnitController<D,DB>>>, org.openbase.jul.storage.registry.Registry<String,UnitController<D,DB>>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Shutdownable, org.openbase.jul.storage.registry.SynchronizableRegistry<String,UnitController<D,DB>>, org.openbase.jul.iface.Writable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UnitControllerRegistryImpl

extends org.openbase.jul.storage.registry.SynchronizableRegistry<String,UnitController<D,DB>>

    • Method Detail

      • getUnitByScope

        UnitController<D,DB> getUnitByScope(String scope)
                             throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Returns a unit controller instance with the given scope.
        Parameters:
        scope - the scope of the unit as string.
        Returns:
        the scope matching unit controller.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown in case there is no unit registered for the given scope.
